# Preserve Inline Links Test

This tests the preserve_inline_links option.

## Introduction

First citation [3](https://example.com/paper-gamma) with inline link.
Second citation [1] without inline link.
Third citation [2](https://example.com/paper-beta) with inline link.

## References

[1]: https://example.com/paper-alpha
[2]: https://example.com/paper-beta-old
[3]: https://example.com/paper-gamma-old
